message.rftoolscontrol.token.header: This item is a simple token. It does not do anything but it can store information
message.rftoolscontrol.program_card.head: This is a card that can store programs. Use the 'Programmer' to write them
message.rftoolscontrol.program_card.name: Name:
message.rftoolscontrol.cpu_core_500.head: This CPU core must be used in the processor to allow it to run programs
message.rftoolscontrol.cpu_core_1000.hea: This CPU core must be used in the processor to allow it to run programs
message.rftoolscontrol.cpu_core_2000.hea: This CPU core must be used in the processor to allow it to run programs
message.rftoolscontrol.card_base.header: This item is the base ingredient for many of the items and machines in RFTools Control
message.rftoolscontrol.graphics_card.hea: The graphics card is needed to be able to draw vector graphics
message.rftoolscontrol.ram_chip.header: Insert this item in the processor to get eight extra variables (max 32)
Tablet that can be used to reference remote gui's and information
Tablet containing information: right click for processor gui, sneak right click for tablet gui
message.rftoolscontrol.network_card.head: Insert this in the processor to allow access to nearby nodes
message.rftoolscontrol.network_card.gold: Use 'net setup <name>' in Processor console to setup the network
message.rftoolscontrol.advanced_network_: Insert this in the processor to allow access to nearby nodes
Use 'net setup <name>' in Processor console to setup the network
message.rftoolscontrol.network_identifie: This item allows a processor to do direct communication with another linked processor
Sneak right-click on a processor to set the target for this module
message.rftoolscontrol.console_module.he: A module for a Screen that allows you to display the console of a processor. This item can also be used in a tablet
message.rftoolscontrol.console_module.go: Sneak right-click on a processor to set the target for this module
message.rftoolscontrol.interaction_modul: A module for a Screen that allows you to interact with a processor
Sneak right-click on a processor to set the target for this module
message.rftoolscontrol.variable_module.h: A module for a Screen that allows you to show variables in a processor
message.rftoolscontrol.variable_module.g: Sneak right-click on a processor to set the target for this module
A module for a Screen that allows you to show vector art from a processor
Sneak right-click on a processor to set the target for this module
message.rftoolscontrol.craftingstation.h: This block assists in auto crafting operations for a Processor
message.rftoolscontrol.tank.header: This is a tank that has capacity for four types of liquids. This block is meant for the processor and cannot otherwise be used directly
message.rftoolscontrol.processor.header: The processor executes programs for automation. Programs should be written on a program card and can be made with the Programmer block
message.rftoolscontrol.programmer.header: Use this block to make programs on a program card for the processor
message.rftoolscontrol.node.header: This node can be remotely accessed by the processor that has a network card installed
message.rftoolscontrol.workbench.header: A general workbench that works well with a processor but can also be used standalone
